Insights¶

Using these endpoints you can view the overall performance of your account as well as individual subaccount performance through mailing and audience growth aggregates.

GET /#account_id/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary¶

Get information about current mailings.

Parameters:
  • from_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to 30 days prior to current date when none are specified.
  • to_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to current date when none are specified.
  • subaccount_ids – Optional parameter that accepts a comma seperated list of subaccount ids.
Raises :

Http400 if invalid subaccount id.
Returns :

A list of mailing information.

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "summary": {
        "bounces": 2430,
        "deliveries": 1293863,
        "mailings_sent": 225,
        "optouts": 2210,
        "total_clicks": 41476,
        "total_opens": 437677,
        "unique_clicks": 27426,
        "unique_opens": 325194
    }
  }
]

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary?from_date=2019-10-02&to_date=2019-10-03
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": "2019-10-03"
    },
    "summary": {
        "bounces": 287,
        "deliveries": 208670,
        "mailings_sent": 21,
        "optouts": 328,
        "total_clicks": 5759,
        "total_opens": 69898,
        "unique_clicks": 3610,
        "unique_opens": 54586
    }
}
]

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary?subaccounts=101,102
[
{
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "summary": {
        "bounces": 106,
        "deliveries": 45367,
        "mailings_sent": 16,
        "optouts": 128,
        "total_clicks": 2284,
        "total_opens": 16003,
        "unique_clicks": 1696,
        "unique_opens": 12562
    }
}
]

GET /#account_id/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary/subaccounts¶

Get information about current mailings by subaccount.

Parameters:
  • from_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to 30 days prior to current date when none are specified.
  • to_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to current date when none are specified.
  • subaccount_ids – Optional parameter that accepts a comma seperated list of subaccount ids.
Raises :

Http400 if invalid subaccount id.
Returns :

A list of mailing information by subbacount.

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary/subaccounts
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "subaccounts": {
        "101": {
            "bounces": 42,
            "deliveries": 30650,
            "mailings_sent": 15,
            "optouts": 97,
            "total_clicks": 860,
            "total_opens": 7802,
            "unique_clicks": 618,
            "unique_opens": 6051
        },
        "102": {
            "bounces": 64,
            "deliveries": 14717,
            "mailings_sent": 1,
            "optouts": 31,
            "total_clicks": 1424,
            "total_opens": 8198,
            "unique_clicks": 1078,
            "unique_opens": 6511
        },
  }
]

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/mailings/summary/subaccounts?subaccount_ids=101
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "subaccounts": {
        "101": {
            "bounces": 42,
            "deliveries": 30650,
            "mailings_sent": 15,
            "optouts": 97,
            "total_clicks": 860,
            "total_opens": 7802,
            "unique_clicks": 618,
            "unique_opens": 6051
        },
  }
]

GET /#account_id/insights/v2/hq/audience¶

Get information about audience growth by subaccount.

Parameters:
  • from_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to 30 days prior to current date when none are specified.
  • to_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to current date when none are specified.
  • subaccount_ids – Optional parameter that accepts a comma seperated list of subaccount ids.
Raises :

Http400 if invalid subaccount id.
Returns :

A list of audience growth information by subaccount.

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/audience
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": null,
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": null
    },
    "summaries": [
        {
            "account_id": 101,
            "ending_total": 27324,
            "starting_total": 27381
        },
        {
            "account_id": 102,
            "ending_total": 30677,
            "starting_total": 28482
        },
  }
]

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/hq/audience?subaccount_ids=101
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": null,
        "timezone": "America/New_York",
        "to_date": null
    },
    "summaries": [
        {
            "account_id": 101,
            "ending_total": 27324,
            "starting_total": 27381
        }
    ]
}
]
